text: 21.15-16: Sng 8.2Hara Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhundu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ, Jisas muhɨmɨmuhɨm avinzɨkwɨ sihɨrami haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgamu. Naŋga ñɨŋisɨrambɨ Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu tavɨ hañɨndu upɨyɨ kɨta nɨmavamba taŋguvɨhumu, Narɨ Devit Nɨŋuñɨŋgirɨm kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨmara, vahu indarɨmu. Harɨm nurɨŋ kɨtɨrɨtɨhi, Jisasɨŋ nɨmavamba kitɨhumu, Na ñɨŋisɨrambɨ nɨŋɨnɨŋ kuyu ambayu nɨ indarɨna, vamu. Kamavahu Jisas kɨmbɨ ambami, Ara yi indarɨn. Hara narɨ kuyu nɨ Gotɨndu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ ŋgatɨŋgɨruta mambaha ŋgandara. Devit Gotɨŋ ambami, Ñɨŋi sukɨsɨrambɨ nandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahandu, vamba ambami, vami.
